Visible Property

CDXML Name:Visible
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Visible
CDX Constant Value:0x0011
Data Size:CDXBoolean
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Node, kCDXObj_Bond, kCDXObj_Text, kCDXObj_Graphic, kCDXObj_Curve, kCDXObj_Table, kCDXObj_NamedAlternativeGroup, kCDXObj_Spectrum, kCDXObj_TLCPlate, kCDXObj_TLCLane, kCDXObj_TLCSpot, kCDXObj_Arrow
First written/read in:ChemDraw 7.0
Required?No

Description:

The object is visible if non-zero.

Note that ChemDraw does not currently offer a general way for making an object visible again once it is made invisible. As of ChemDraw 7.0, this property is used only for Object Tag objects, which can be hidden and reshown.

If this property is absent:

The object will be displayed
